<ol><li><p data-testid="breadcrumb-text">Exclusive</p></li></ol>
<h1>DraftKings Drops ‘Diverse’ and ‘Inclusive’ From Public Statement, Internal Emails Show</h1>
<p>A DraftKings legal executive deleted the words “diverse” and “inclusive” from the draft of a statement that detailed the firm’s plans to launch a Spanish language feature on its sports-betting app, according to an email exchange reviewed by <em data-type="emphasis">Barron’s</em>.</p>
<figure><p class="rw-outer-content"><span>Some content could not be imported from the original document.</span> <a href="https://piano.vx.barrons.com/checkout/template/cacheableShow?aid=ETbHfCPwpu&amp;templateId=OT15M2XC8FWP&amp;templateVariantId=OTVRSSGIC4HM8&amp;offerId=fakeOfferId&amp;experienceId=EXAL1X4TS0S0&amp;iframeId=offer_27cbe9609a2ec354339c-0&amp;displayMode=inline&amp;pianoIdUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fpiano.auth.barrons.com%2Fid%2F&amp;widget=template&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.barrons.com%2Farticles%2Fdraftkings-stock-price-spanish-diverse-inclusive-240db469">View content ↗ </a></p></figure>
